name: Animated Armor
senses: keensense 60 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The animated armor makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
special_abilities.desc: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by _dispel magic_, the armor must succeed on a CON save against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: The armor doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Construct Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The armor is immune to poison and psychic damage, and it is immune to exhaustion and the charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and poisoned conditions.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.
